State.Author: BloodiestCODY
State.Description: This will add a new splash screen upon MO2 startup and adds a new Theme / Stylesheet for your TTW needs
State.Name: Tale of Two Wastelands - Mod Organizer 2 Theme and Custom Splash Screen

State.Author: B42 Team and fantastic Fallout New Vegas community
State.Description:
Adds descriptions to all items in the game. For extra roleplaying experience.

This mod is community-driven and is part of the Project B42

Contributions are welcome!
State.Name: B42 Descriptions aka Pip-Info

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description:
Trade in all Caps at once.

Trade in all Legion money at once.

Trade in all NCR money at once.

Trade in all Pre-war money at once.

Trade in all Caps, Legion, NCR, Pre-war money at once.

Trade in all Legion, NCR, Pre-war money at once.



Optional console command in-game that removes the pre-war money.
State.Name: Casino Exchange All

State.Author: Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: Stops the annoying messages that display when a new DLC is loaded.
State.Name: Delay DLC TTW

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description: Adds extra info to HUD, including Value/Weight ratio, Recipe list, Companion weight, Ammo Comparison vs Target, Recipe input vs output comparison, etc
State.Name: Enhanced Item Info - Extra UI HUD

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description:
Adds an MCM menu with options for adjust World Field of View, Player Field of View, Pipboy Field of View and Terminal Screen Field of View.

Also allows adjusting the Scope Scissor Amount, Weapon FOV Ratio, FOV Zoom time, Dialogue Zoom time and Dialogue delay time.
State.Name: FOV Slider

Original.Name: Functional Post Game Ending - FOMOD Installation-66726-4-0-1-1603991011.7z

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a fully functional post-game world to the game, no longer will you be brought to the credits and end your journey there. Instead, you will realise the consequences of what endings you've gotten and explore a vastly changed world.
State.Name: FPGE - Functional Post Game Ending

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod is designed to revolutionize the way companions are controlled and interacted with, rendering the companion-wheel obsolete and bringing new elements of team-work and tactics, with the intention of making the game look and feel more as a proper role-playing game than as an action-shooter.
State.Name: JIP Companions Command and Control

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod makes the crafting interface (Recipe Menu) easier, more efficient and less tedious to use.
State.Name: JIP Improved Recipe Menu

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Xilandro
State.Description:
If you can throw it - you can pick it up. Unless it's a grenade. Don't pick up grenades without pins, no, seriously.

Also you can make ladders out of spears and climb things.
State.Name: Retrievable Throwables

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description: Uses JIPLN plugin to dynamically load the workbench formlists in Sortomatic so that its workbenches can pull in recipe items from mod-added recipes, not just vanilla and DLC.
State.Name: Sortomatic Ingredient Loader

State.Author: tunaisafish and Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: Sortomatic is a script and object library designed primarily for player homes.
State.Name: Sortomatic - Modders Resource

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Provides a new weapon modification menu for adding/removing weapon mods.
State.Name: The Weapon Mod Menu

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description: Adds very minimalist Sortomatic to The Pitt, Point Lookout, Mothership Zeta, Dead Money, Honest Hearts, and Lonesome Road. For Tale of Two Wastelands 3.2.
State.Name: TTW DLC Sortomatic Homes

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Converts all Fallout 3 dialogue to use the New Vegas speech system.
State.Name: TTW New Vegas Speech Checks

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a functional reputation system to Fallout 3 alike New Vegas.
State.Name: TTW Reputations

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod introduces a selective-fire system to Fallout: New Vegas. Most projectile-type weapons, capable of automatic fire, will have two or more optional fire-modes for the player to switch between: single/burst/auto.
State.Name: JIP Selective-Fire

State.Author: Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: A container loot menu inspired by Fallout 4, with a Fallout: New Vegas aesthetic. Loot in real-time! Supports keyboards and controllers!
State.Name: Loot Menu for FNV

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Quick start plugin to skip Vault 101 and start in the cave just outside the vault.
State.Name: Tale of Two Wastelands Quick Start

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: Uses scripts to make it so fan favorite armor mods don't conflict with other mods.
State.Name: Modded Armor Compatibility

State.Author: weijiesen
State.Description: Professional quality Ballistic VFX overhaul. Bullet Holes match ammo, casings match ammo, new custom particle effects impacts.
State.Name: IMPACT

State.Author: weijiesen - darthbdaman
State.Description:
Replacement main plugin for IMPACT, that automatically patches all weapons in the game, DLC, and mods, to have the appropriate Shell Casings and Impact Data Sets based on their ammo types. Work with all weapons that use vanilla or DLC ammo lists or ammo types.



Includes scripted compatibility for companion weapons and NPC ammo types.
State.Name: IMPACT - Compatibility Edition (JIP LN) (DLC - TTW - All Mods)

State.Author: emeraldreign nekronom cabal wjs dragbody
State.Description: Revamps the NCR troopers. Completely functional, but still a WIP. Check back for updates.
State.Name: NCR Trooper Overhaul_beta

State.Author: sandbox6
State.Description:
Restores a huge amount of scenery and little random things which were patched out of the game post-release.

And because people asked for them, the fluff NPCs and creatures too.

This mod puts it all back. Well, the worthwhile stuff anyway.
State.Name: Uncut Wasteland

State.Author: CaBaL
State.Description: high resolution texture replacement
State.Name: aMidianBorn NV Book Of Water

State.Author: sandbox6
State.Description:
Restores a huge amount of scenery and little random things which were patched out of the game post-release.

And because people asked for them, the fluff NPCs and creatures too.

This mod puts it all back. Well, the worthwhile stuff anyway.
State.Name: Uncut Wasteland

State.Author: sandbox6
State.Description:
Restores a huge amount of scenery and little random things which were patched out of the game post-release.

And because people asked for them, the fluff NPCs and creatures too.

This mod puts it all back. Well, the worthwhile stuff anyway.
State.Name: Uncut Wasteland

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: This is a pack release containing all my New Vegas weapon retextures. This will be periodically updated but not necessarily immediately after I release something new.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture Project - WRP

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: This is a pack release containing all my New Vegas weapon retextures. This will be periodically updated but not necessarily immediately after I release something new.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture Project - WRP

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Re-Texture of Vanilla Heavy Weapons
State.Name: IHWT - Improved Heavy Weapons Textures

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: This is a pack release containing all my New Vegas weapon retextures. This will be periodically updated but not necessarily immediately after I release something new.
State.Name: Weapon Retexture Project - WRP

State.Author: the a - burns
State.Description:
High Res textures for various weapons:
-Combat Shotgun
-Hunting Rifle
-Laser Rifle
-Lincoln Rifle
-10mm Pistol
-10mm SMG
-Laserpistol
-.44 Magnum
-Bottlecap Mine
-Frag Mine
-Frag Grenade
-Gatling Laser
-Minigun
-RockIt Launcher
-Flamethrower
-Fatman
-Missilelauncher
-Railwayrifle
-Sniperrifle
-Plasmarifle
-Chinese Officersword
State.Name: Hi-Res Weapons v3

State.Author: Sal203 and Camo
State.Description: A complete weather overhaul for Fallout New Vegas and its DLCs with complete Tale of Two Wastelands support. Designed to make the game look more realistic. Improves lighting, weather, clouds, stars, moon and the overall look and feel of the wasteland, developed using reference desert photos and extensive testing
State.Name: FNV Realistic Wasteland Lighting

State.Author: Sal203 and Camo
State.Description: A complete weather overhaul for Fallout New Vegas and its DLCs with complete Tale of Two Wastelands support. Designed to make the game look more realistic. Improves lighting, weather, clouds, stars, moon and the overall look and feel of the wasteland, developed using reference desert photos and extensive testing
State.Name: FNV Realistic Wasteland Lighting

State.Author: Vandrerer
State.Description: Retexture of creatures with totally new bump-maps and sharpened mip maps!
State.Name: Vandr HD Creatures

State.Author: CptJoker
State.Description:
Mojave Nights combines my Enhanced Night Sky mod with a brand-new, highly detailed moon replacement for complete night-time realism. See the desert stars and moon in their real glory!

(Now with FOMOD installer)
State.Name: Mojave Nights - a moon and stars replacer

State.Author: ghussak
State.Description: Press E or X key to close a hacking or a computer terminal.
State.Name: Close computer or hacking terminal Hotkey

State.Author: M3rvin
State.Description: Changes the color of the terminals to you HUD one.
State.Name: Terminals Use HUD Color NV

State.Author: ZaAl
State.Description:
Speeds up terminal type rate.

No more waiting for login and text display.
State.Name: Faster Terminals

State.Author: Kyle and Kira
State.Description: Patches Fallout New California (version 231) with Tale of Two Wastelands (version 3.2.2). Three games all in one. Read the disclaimers.
State.Name: Star the Wandering Courier (FNC-TTW Patch)

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.

State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Mike Hancho - Roy Batty
State.Description: An exciting, fun and challenging quest to 10 forgotten locations
State.Name: TTW A Trail of Crumbs

Original.Name: A World of Pain for Fallout 3-66265-2-02-1553205677.7z

State.Author: djmystro - Roy Batty
State.Description: Adds many intense and unique locations to the Capital Wasteland, new items, 4D storage, two companions and a couple of quests.
State.Name: TTW A World of Pain for Fallout 3

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Someguy2000
State.Description: Pursue high-risk bounties across the Mojave Wasteland in this fully-voiced adventure mod.
State.Name: New Vegas Bounties I

State.Author: Someguy
State.Description: This is the master file required for all of Someguy2000's quest mods.
State.Name: The Someguy Series

Original.Name: TTW A World of Pain A World of Pain for Fallout 3-66268-1-01-1552236281.7z

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Compatibility patches for A World of Pain, A World of Pain for Fallout 3 and Tale of Two Wastelands. Makes AWOP NV work with TTW and FO3AWOP work with AWOP NV. Fixes the known Super Mutant Fist issue caused by incorrect form list/form list being overwritten.
State.Name: TTW A World of Pain Patches

State.Author: Chucksteel
State.Description:
This is a total merge of The D.C. Interiors Project, The N.V. Interiors Project and some of my other mods.



 Updated for A Tale of Two Wastelands v3.2.x
State.Name: The TTW Interiors Project

State.Author: Chucksteel
State.Description:
This is a total merge of The D.C. Interiors Project, The N.V. Interiors Project and some of my other mods.



 Updated for A Tale of Two Wastelands v3.2.x
State.Name: The TTW Interiors Project

State.Author: B42
State.Description: A mod that adds melee attacks for non-melee weapons, similar to melee hits and buttstrokes in modern FPS games.
State.Name: B42 Melee Bash

State.Author: llamaRCA and Nivea
State.Description: Willow is not the usual girl companion. She is a story-driven character with over 1200 lines of voiced dialogue. She enriches your gameplay experience with her complex companion behaviors and her responses to the gameworld.
State.Name: Willow - A Better Companion Experience

State.Author: Various - Maintained by darthbdaman
State.Description:
Adds Seam Concealing Chains and Pendants to all NPC's throughout the wasteland. Dynamically distributes them through scripts, allowing for compatibility with anything.



No requirements, supports DLC and TTW. Includes config file for toggling on and off playable necklaces, and male and/or female distribution.
State.Name: Distributed Necklaces and Chains (JIP LN NVSE) (DLC and TTW)

State.Author: HRTKING
State.Description: Listen to THREE DAWWWG in NV!
State.Name: Radios of Two Wastelands

State.Author: Heaven3xx3
State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era
State.Name: WTH - Weapon Textures from Heaven

State.Author: Macabre Productions
State.Description: This mod adds 55 music tracks from the Atomic era and 29 authentic public-service announcements from Civil Defense!
State.Name: CONELRAD 640-1240  -  Civil Defense Radio

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

State.Author: B42
State.Description: A Metro-inspired wrist watch that shows you things like time.
State.Name: B42 Wristwatch

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora and Hitman47101
State.Description:
This mod adds brand new, modern throwing weapons mechanic, as seen in Metro, COD, Fallout 4 and some other FPS games.

The aim was to make it look and feel like it was always in the game.

This mod is part of the Project B42
State.Name: B42 Quickthrow - an alternative grenade hotkey mod

State.Author: Phoenixfang55
State.Description: A perk at every level.
State.Name: Perk Every Level

Original.Name: Nuka-Cola Machine Replacer Animated ver. (ESP version)-59783-1-3.zip

State.Author: EdibleGrenade12 and weijiesen
State.Description: A model & texture replacer for the Nuka-Cola vending machines, inspired by the Fallout 4 announcement trailer.
State.Name: Fallout 4-Style Nuka-Cola Vending Machine Replacer

State.Author: EdibleGrenade12
State.Description: A replacer for the Sunset Sarsaparilla vending machine in the style of real-world retro vending machines. Made due to requests on my Fallout 4 Nuka-Cola vending machine mod to make both vending machines the same scale.
State.Name: New Sunset Sarsaparilla Vending Machine Replacer

State.Author: EdibleGrenade12
State.Description: A replacer for the Sunset Sarsaparilla vending machine in the style of real-world retro vending machines. Made due to requests on my Fallout 4 Nuka-Cola vending machine mod to make both vending machines the same scale.
State.Name: New Sunset Sarsaparilla Vending Machine Replacer

State.Author: Tallulahkat
State.Description: Changes the Pip-Boy light to be brighter and have a larger radius
State.Name: Brighter Larger Radius Pip-Boy Light

State.Author: HeroinZero
State.Description: SImple loading wheel replacing mod, aimed for TTW users but obviously can be used without it.
State.Name: Vault Door Loading Wheel - TTW

State.Author: vurt and Marcurios
State.Description: 100+ new desert types of trees and plants. 3D LODS! Better looking grass. New terrain textures (optional).
State.Name: Wasteland Flora and Terrain Overhaul

State.Author: vurt
State.Description: New trees and flora. Several versions to choose from.
State.Name: FO3 Flora Overhaul

State.Author: EdisLeado
State.Description: Seamless smoking. No cumbersome menus or items. Simply click a cigarette, cigar, or cigarillo, in your inventory (just like you would with any other AID item) to light them up and smoke away.
State.Name: Light Up and Smoke Those Cigarettes (and Cigars and Cigarillos)

Original.Name: Light Up and Smoke Those Cigarettes v6d-49677-6d.zip

State.Author: EdisLeado
State.Description: Seamless smoking. No cumbersome menus or items. Simply click a cigarette, cigar, or cigarillo, in your inventory (just like you would with any other AID item) to light them up and smoke away.
State.Name: Light Up and Smoke Those Cigarettes (and Cigars and Cigarillos)

State.Author: MystykStar
State.Description: Makes the chem and alcohol wear-off effects much shorter.
State.Name: Shorter Chem Wear-off Effects

State.Author: Rocket
State.Description: This redesigns Joshua Graham, The Burned Man, to much more closely match his appearance in the game art. Now he actually looks burnt!
State.Name: Authentic Burned Man

State.Author: dDefinder
State.Description: Increases the resolution size from 256 to 1024 and created new textures for screen, world, wounds, static blood decals and gore. Esps are used to increase the size appearance of the blood. Adjustments for screenblood, add more giblets and new wounds related to the weapon type. Ini will change max amount and lifetime for blood.
State.Name: Enhanced Blood Textures for NV v2_22c

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.
State.Name: Improved Robots Textures

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.
State.Name: Improved Robots Textures

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.
State.Name: Improved Robots Textures

State.Author: Lord Inquisitor
State.Description:
High Retex for ncr notes and legion coins NukaColaCap and now SSBottleCap and SSbottleCap02

Contents: 8 nif and 17 dds
State.Name: Money Higher  Quality Retex 1_2

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: This mod let's you eat your Mom during your Point Lookout adventure!
State.Name: TTW PL Eat Your Mom

State.Author: carxt - CovenantTurtle
State.Description: Randomises NPC height in such a way that it's consistent across saves and playthroughs. Includes customisable INI settings for height scaling with SPECIAL, and/or gender disparity.
State.Name: Height Randomizer NVSE

State.Author: sarcopterygians
State.Description: This turns almost all glass translucent
State.Name: NV Translucency Overhaul

State.Description: This turns almost all glass translucent
State.Name: NV Translucency Overhaul

State.Author: dasbadman
State.Description: Snuffles has a big slash wound and gets a medical dressing when you fix him up + compatibility with The Molerat Extravaganza.
State.Name: Snuffles Redesigned

State.Author: LolzMan1325
State.Description: Fixes General Oliver's hat being sideways when Tale of Two Wastelands is installed. Despite the name, TTW isn't required to use this mod, just in-case you have this issue but not TTW.
State.Name: TTW General Oliver Hat Fix

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds customisable and optional prefixes to all items in the game. Automatically covers all items added by other mods and DLC. Customisable, more accurate, and less script intensive than other similar mods.
State.Name: Universal Item Sorter

State.Author: friendlynonmurderingsort
State.Description: Adds the unused hobo code trail signs already present in the game's files to several locations in the Mojave!
State.Name: Hobo Code of the Mojave

State.Author: Mr LOL
State.Description: A super small dialogue replacer mod that allows you to tell Benny the game was rigged from the start, before popping him in the head.
State.Name: The Truth Is... A Simple Dialogue Replacer

State.Author: polferrera
State.Description: Retextures the members of the Think Tank + Dr. Mobius so that have an unique appearance. Also retextures Saturnite and Regular Artillery Shells...'cos why not
State.Name: Old World Blues - Unique Think Tank Members

State.Author: bankyboo
State.Description: This fixes an incompatibility between TTW 3.2 and Project Nevada Equipment where DC super mutants won't use equipped weapons.
State.Name: TTW 3.2 and Project Nevada Super Mutant Weapon Fix

State.Author: Lopham
State.Description: Seamlessly Integrates GunRunner's Arsenal into the main game and gets rid of naming annoyances.
State.Name: GunRunners Arsenal Integration Mod

State.Author: SHAD0WC0BRA
State.Description: Makes the GRA unique weapons unavailable for purchase and scatters them across the Mojave, Zion, and the Big MT - just like all the other unique weapons.
State.Name: GRA Unique Weapons Relocated

State.Author: Me myself and I along with countless other modders
State.Description: Aims to overhaul diversity and uniqueness in the Capital Wasteland
State.Name: Fafnir's Fallout 3 Unique items Overhaul TTW Edition

State.Author: Illyixtin
State.Description: Adds all 54 cards from the New Vegas Collector's Edition deck as Caravan Cards hidden throughout the Mojave.
State.Name: New Vegas Collector's Cards

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

State.Author: c6 but uploaded by JamesiaInc
State.Description: Adds a small dialogue check (requiring 8+ Intelligence) to translate" Nihi Nove Sub Sole" when Arcade is speaking to you, resulting in being able to recruit him by showing your knowledge.
State.Name: Arcade respects your intellect

Original.Name: TTW Tell Dad About Jonas v1.0.1 (Plugin Only)-67555-1-0-1-1567383223.rar

State.Author: mc_tammer
State.Description: Adds a fourth dialogue choice to the Tranquility Lane quest where you can tell Dad that the Overseer murdered Jonas and tried to kill you, which is why you left the Vault.
State.Name: (TTW) Tell Dad About Jonas

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A further expansion, and slight tweaking, of the "A Roleplayer's History" series of mods, adding a few of my own in the process.
State.Name: A Roleplayer's History - Patchy's Picks

State.Author: Tel Shadow
State.Description: Redoes the entire sea floor found in Fallout 3, No more flat shallow sea floor now behold dark and deep sea floors layed with details and things to discover, Also is compatible with Fallout 3 Rebirth.
State.Name: Below The Depths - TTW Port

Original.Name: Dead Money - Surprise Vending Items Restoration-49703-.zip

State.Author: Yukichigai
State.Description: Implements the cut \"Surprise\" vending machine redemption options.
State.Name: Dead Money - Surprise Vending Items Restoration

State.Author: McPipe
State.Description: Makes the criers around Freeside say their lines only if you are close to them.
State.Name: Freeside less annoying criers

State.Author: Rachel
State.Description: Adds 3 new traits (Merchant, NCR Quartermaster, and NCR Recon) to the game.
State.Name: A Roleplayers History - More History

State.Author: Adul
State.Description: Keeping Cass alive without breaking any quests - now it\'s possible!
State.Name: Save Cass

State.Author: Migck
State.Description: Makes Antivenom anti all the venom
State.Name: Universal Antivenom

State.Author: huntermane
State.Description: Changes Veronica's armor while attempting to stay true to her original design. This outfit is more practical looking than her standard druid robes and gives her more of a scavenger appearance.  Outfit was made using vanilla assets.
State.Name: Veronica Outfit Replacer

State.Author: coach shogun 20
State.Description: Adds several traits that allow you to build a past for your character and slightly modify your stats.
State.Name: A Roleplayers History

State.Author: Soukey
State.Description: Ringo gives you an ordinary deck of cards.  A new game mod.
State.Name: Common Caravan Deck

Original.Name: TTW Dialogue Expansion for Role-Players v1.1-70907-1-1-1612224075.rar

State.Author: mc_tammer
State.Description: This mod adds additional dialogue options that I felt were missing from Fallout 3. Requires Tale of Two Wastelands.
State.Name: (TTW) D.E.R.P. - Dialogue Expansion for Role-Players

State.Author: Demorome
State.Description: Resets the player's Level, XP, Skills, Perks and Karma upon travelling from the CW to the Mojave for the first time. This is done to preserve the difficulty of New Vegas and to provide an opportunity to start anew.
State.Name: (TTW) Benny Humbles You

State.Author: Macabre Productions
State.Description: Featuring over 180 minutes of original music across 64 tracks & 55 minutes of original broadcast dialogue  featuring the robot DJ JunK'et
State.Name: Existence 2-0  -Robot Radio-

State.Author: JackArbiter
State.Description: A compilation of four mods that change the card game caravan, applying changes to each from the others and tweaking for balance. Makes caravan harder (read: not easy as pie), increases amount of games you can play with vendors, and restores caravan play to 3 NPCs that were originally supposed to play.
State.Name: Caravan Overhaul Compilation

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Clean first person animations for New Vegas. No new idles, no bugs, no reload cancelling from shooting early or crouching, no compatibility issues.



Now with kNVSE!



Please see the "Animations" section for video demonstrations of the animations. Please visit the "Changelog" tab to keep up with what is added.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations

State.Author: Jmababa
State.Description: GNR Enhanced for Tales of Two Wastelands
State.Name: GNR Enhanced for Tales of Two Wastelands

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: Allows you to bypass the lockpick and hack minigames if you have the proper skill by pressing Z.
State.Name: Bypass Minigames - Lockpick and Hacking

State.Author: Raptre
State.Description: Adds 100 great theme fitting songs from "More Where That Came From" by OldManMose76 to Galaxy News Radio while retaining the original 20 songs.  Many enhancements and fixes including synching three-dog news reports to quest progress.
State.Name: GNR Enhanced

State.Author: yvileapsis and others
State.Description:
A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.
State.Name: JAM - Just Assorted Mods

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: Adds a customizable mini-map to the HUD display.
State.Name: JIP MiniMap

State.Author: pintocat - Roy Batty
State.Description: This removes message boxes that pop up during the tutorial, as well as one-time help pop-ups,  repeating corner-messages.
State.Name: Tutorial Killer

State.Author: Oliver Swanick
State.Description:
300 lore-friendly, normalised tracks for Radio NV, nearly all those referenced in-game, and one (1) bajillion customisable features.

Feature creep done right.  You want this.
State.Name: Music Pack for Radio NV - 300 Songs.

State.Author: Roy Batty - Puppettron - Qolore
State.Description: Ballistic Locational Energy Explosive Damage
State.Name: BLEED

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FNVEdit is the Fallout New Vegas version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.

State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: Conor96
State.Description: A simple but chic globe mesh and texture replacer
State.Name: Vintage Globe

State.Author: ProfMajkowski
State.Description: A collection of a few clutter replacements. Currently includes 5 items with completely new meshes and textures.
State.Name: New Clutter Pack

State.Description:
VIDEO-DEMO: http://youtu.be/jKMA-ESDDn4?hd=1

This skin replaces the default sand storm texture by a more real and dramatic one:

- A completely new HighRes texture.
- Improved details and added new ones. [Leaves and blades of grass floating in the air, more turbulent atmosphere].
- Texture size is increased to 4096x4096 [Also included: Defau
State.Name: Hectrol FX DUSTSTORM Deluxe HighRes Retex

Original.Name: NMCs Textures NV SMALL Pack SINGLE FILE FOR NMM-43135-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Description: Implements structured exception handling and sanity checking to reduce frequency of game crashes.

State.Description: HD Retextures of all Caesar's Legion armors, Marked Men armors, + more.

Original.Name: NMCs Texture Pack Performance Pack SINGLE FILE FOR NMM-12056-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description:
NeilMc_NMC's Global texture pack for Fallout 3. Does not cover the DLC. Replaces Terrain, trees, interiors/ exteriors, and most vehicles and furniture with high resolution (200-400%) real-life photograph-based equivalents. Now in FOUR Sizes to suit your PC.



Now with added NMM compatibility!
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_for_FO3

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod is designed to update the HUD for 1080p resolutions or higher (1440p, 4K, etc) while maintaining the same original look and style.
State.Name: Vanilla HUD Remastered (4K)

Original.Name: Shiloh DS - Clean Pipboy Screen v1_4-36255-1.rar

State.Author: Shiloh
State.Description: This mod enables you to remove the screen glare, scan lines, distortion effects, and map tinting from your pipboy screen. It also allows you to adjust the glow intensity of your map.
State.Name: Shiloh DS - Clean Pipboy Screen

State.Author: ObsidianStag
State.Description: Collected works of my clutter retextures
State.Name: Retextured Clutter Collection

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: A Terminal screen without glare.
State.Name: Clean Terminal Screen

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: Ojo Bueno
State.Description: Welcome to the Ojo Bueno High Quality Texture Workshop -- Now available in single-file mod-manager-friendly texture pack downloads!

State.Description: This turns almost all glass translucent

State.Author: Carxt - Tgspy - lStewieAl
State.Description: The newest generation in performance enhancement and stutter fixing. Windows 10 compatible. Featuring fixes to the dreaded micro stutter, and a high FPS Havok fix.
State.Name: NVTF - New Vegas Tick Fix

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

Original.Name: New Vegas Collector's Cards - Custom Card Back-72036-1-0-1-1618181511.7z

State.Description: Custom card backs for New Vegas Collector's Cards.

State.Author: Faram AKA Biohazard
State.Description:
Fixing the Mojave LOD, one eyesore at a time. 



LOD texture patches for NMCs, Poco/Ojo Beuno and George's landscape for proper LODs.
State.Name: FNV LOD Texture Patches

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enables having custom animations for weapons and actors. Fixes the engine-bound anim group limit problem.

State.Author: carxt - lStewieAl - c6
State.Description: PLAY THE GUITAR, PLAY IT AGAIN, MY JOHNNYYYYYYYYYYYY.
State.Name: JohnnyGuitar NVSE

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 900+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
A fully customisable engine plugin providing a collection of optional bugfixes, tweaks and new features to the game with no performance impact. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Adds actual visual kick/muzzle flip to the iron sights fire animations.
State.Name: Iron Sights Recoil Animations

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

I always tought vanilla hairs werw a bit too hiny...this mod will fix that.

Normalmaps replacer for vanilla hairs.
